title: A somatic view of the genomic impact of mitochondrial endosymbiosis
content:
by Rose M. Doss, Martin W. Breuss

The endosymbiosis of mitochondrial ancestors resulted in the transfer of genetic material on an evolutionary scale for eukaryotic species. A new study in PLOS Biology expands this to the genome of somatic cells within individuals and highlights its correlation with aging and disease.
